definition: crybaby
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to cry/to weep
ghost/demon/terrible/damnable/clever/sly/crafty/(suffix for sb with a certain vice or addiction etc)/one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: France is a thin skinned cry baby.
sentences.chinese: 法國是個小氣的愛哭鬼。

sentences.english: I am very easy to be moved. so, my friends always treat me as a lachrymose ghost.
sentences.chinese: 我很容易被感動，所以朋友總說我是個愛哭鬼。

sentences.english: Can't for you again like to cry the ghost.
sentences.chinese: 不會再爲你做個愛哭鬼。
